name: dfareporting_placementGroups_get
description: Gets one placement group by ID.

profileId.description: User profile ID associated with this request.

fields.description: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

key.description: API key. Your API key identifies your project and provides you with API access, quota, and reports. Required unless you provide an OAuth 2.0 token.

oauth_token.description: OAuth 2.0 token for the current user.

prettyPrint.description: Returns response with indentations and line breaks.

quotaUser.description: Available to use for quota purposes for server-side applications. Can be any arbitrary string assigned to a user, but should not exceed 40 characters.

$block: Contains properties of a package or roadblock.

$ul: **accountId**: Account ID of this placement group. This is a read-only field that can be left blank.
**advertiserId**: Advertiser ID of this placement group. This is a required field on insertion.
**advertiserIdDimensionValue**: Represents a DimensionValue resource.
**dimensionName**: The name of the dimension.
**etag**: The eTag of this response for caching purposes.
**id**: The ID associated with the value if available.
**kind**: The kind of resource this is, in this case dfareporting#dimensionValue.

**matchType**: Determines how the 'value' field is matched when filtering. If not specified, defaults to EXACT. If set to WILDCARD_EXPRESSION, '*' is allowed as a placeholder for variable length character sequences, and it can be escaped with a backslash. Note, only paid search dimensions ('dfa:paidSearch*') allow a matchType other than EXACT.
**value**: The value of the dimension.
**archived**: Whether this placement group is archived.
**campaignId**: Campaign ID of this placement group. This field is required on insertion.
**campaignIdDimensionValue**: Represents a DimensionValue resource.
**dimensionName**: The name of the dimension.
**etag**: The eTag of this response for caching purposes.
**id**: The ID associated with the value if available.
**kind**: The kind of resource this is, in this case dfareporting#dimensionValue.

If set to WILDCARD_EXPRESSION, '*' is allowed as a placeholder for variable length character sequences, and it can be escaped with a backslash. Note, only paid search dimensions ('dfa:paidSearch*') allow a matchType other than EXACT.
**value**: The value of the dimension.
**childPlacementIds**: IDs of placements which are assigned to this placement group. This is a read-only, auto-generated field.
**comment**: Comments for this placement group.
**contentCategoryId**: ID of the content category assigned to this placement group.
**createInfo**: Modification timestamp.
**time**: Timestamp of the last change in milliseconds since epoch.

**directorySiteId**: Directory site ID associated with this placement group. On insert, you must set either this field or the site_id field to specify the site associated with this placement group. This is a required field that is read-only after insertion.
**directorySiteIdDimensionValue**: Represents a DimensionValue resource.
**dimensionName**: The name of the dimension.
**etag**: The eTag of this response for caching purposes.
**id**: The ID associated with the value if available.
**kind**: The kind of resource this is, in this case dfareporting#dimensionValue.

**matchType**: Determines how the 'value' field is matched when filtering. If not specified, defaults to EXACT. If set to WILDCARD_EXPRESSION, '*' is allowed as a placeholder for variable length character sequences, and it can be escaped with a backslash. Note, only paid search dimensions ('dfa:paidSearch*') allow a matchType other than EXACT.
**value**: The value of the dimension.
**externalId**: External ID for this placement.
**id**: ID of this placement group. This is a read-only, auto-generated field.
**idDimensionValue**: Represents a DimensionValue resource.
**dimensionName**: The name of the dimension.
**etag**: The eTag of this response for caching purposes.
**id**: The ID associated with the value if available.
**kind**: The kind of resource this is, in this case dfareporting#dimensionValue.

**matchType**: Determines how the 'value' field is matched when filtering. If not specified, defaults to EXACT. If set to WILDCARD_EXPRESSION, '*' is allowed as a placeholder for variable length character sequences, and it can be escaped with a backslash. Note, only paid search dimensions ('dfa:paidSearch*') allow a matchType other than EXACT.
**value**: The value of the dimension.
**kind**: Identifies what kind of resource this is. Value: the fixed string "dfareporting#placementGroup".
**lastModifiedInfo**: Modification timestamp.
**time**: Timestamp of the last change in milliseconds since epoch.
**name**: Name of this placement group. This is a required field and must be less than 256 characters long.

**placementGroupType**: Type of this placement group. A package is a simple group of placements that acts as a single pricing point for a group of tags. A roadblock is a group of placements that not only acts as a single pricing point, but also assumes that all the tags in it will be served at the same time. A roadblock requires one of its assigned placements to be marked as primary for reporting. This field is required on insertion.
**placementStrategyId**: ID of the placement strategy assigned to this placement group.
**pricingSchedule**: Pricing Schedule
**capCostOption**: Placement cap cost option.
**disregardOverdelivery**: Whether cap costs are ignored by ad serving.
**endDate**
**flighted**: Whether this placement is flighted. If true, pricing periods will be computed automatically.
**floodlightActivityId**: Floodlight activity ID associated with this placement. This field should be set when placement pricing type is set to PRICING_TYPE_CPA.
**pricingPeriods**: Pricing periods for this placement.
**pricingType**: Placement pricing type. This field is required on insertion.
**startDate**
**testingStartDate**

**primaryPlacementId**: ID of the primary placement, used to calculate the media cost of a roadblock (placement group). Modifying this field will automatically modify the primary field on all affected roadblock child placements.
**primaryPlacementIdDimensionValue**: Represents a DimensionValue resource.
**dimensionName**: The name of the dimension.
**etag**: The eTag of this response for caching purposes.
**id**: The ID associated with the value if available.
**kind**: The kind of resource this is, in this case dfareporting#dimensionValue.

**matchType**: Determines how the 'value' field is matched when filtering. If not specified, defaults to EXACT. If set to WILDCARD_EXPRESSION, '*' is allowed as a placeholder for variable length character sequences, and it can be escaped with a backslash. Note, only paid search dimensions ('dfa:paidSearch*') allow a matchType other than EXACT.
**value**: The value of the dimension.

**siteId**: Site ID associated with this placement group. On insert, you must set either this field or the directorySiteId field to specify the site associated with this placement group. This is a required field that is read-only after insertion.
**siteIdDimensionValue**: Represents a DimensionValue resource.

If set to WILDCARD_EXPRESSION, '*' is allowed as a placeholder for variable length character sequences, and it can be escaped with a backslash. Note, only paid search dimensions ('dfa:paidSearch*') allow a matchType other than EXACT.
**value**: The value of the dimension.
**subaccountId**: Subaccount ID of this placement group. This is a read-only field that can be left blank.
